# Core dependencies for the code evaluation system
azure-ai-inference==1.0.0b9
azure-identity
PyGithub
requests
GitPython

# For dependency graph visualization
graphviz
networkx>=2.8.0

# Visual chart generation dependencies (optimized list)
matplotlib>=3.5.0
numpy>=1.21.0

# Removed unused packages:
# - sonarqube-api (not used in current scripts)
# - pylint (not directly imported)
# - pathlib2 (only needed for Python < 3.4)
# - ast-decompiler (not used in current scripts)
# - seaborn (not used in current scripts)
# - Pillow (not directly imported, matplotlib handles images)
# - pandas (not used in current scripts)
# - regex (using built-in re module instead)
